resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107721</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107721</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206617</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Guilford Courthouse National Military Park</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Guilford Gericht-Nationaler Militärischer Park</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Parc Militaire National de Tribunal de Guilford</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Parque Militar Nacional Do Tribunal De Guilford</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Parco Militare Nazionale Del Courthouse Di 
Guilford</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εθνικό στρατιωτικό πάρκο δικαστηρίων Guilford</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Parque Militar Nacional Del Palacio de justicia De
Guilford</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">describes weapons, medicine, food, leisure hours, and the role of women in the Revolutionary War. It also examines the battle that was the largest of the Southern Campaign and that helped change the course of the war.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">beschreibt Waffen, Medizin, Nahrung, 
Freizeitstunden und die Rolle der Frauen im revolutionären Krieg. 
Er überprüft auch die Schlacht, die der südlichen Kampagne 
das größte waren und die Änderung der Kurs des Krieges half.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">décrit les armes, la médecine, la nourriture, 
les heures de loisirs, et le rôle des femmes dans la guerre 
révolutionnaire. Elle examine également la bataille qui était
la plus grande de la campagne méridionale et qui a aidé le 
changement le cours de la guerre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">descreve armas, medicina, alimento, horas do 
lazer, e o papel das mulheres na guerra revolucionária. Examina
também a batalha que eram a maior da campanha do sul e que ajudou à 
mudança o curso da guerra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">descrive le armi, la medicina, l'alimento, le ore 
di svago ed il ruolo delle donne nella guerra rivoluzionaria. 
Egualmente esamina la battaglia che era il più grande della 
campagna del sud e che ha aiutato il cambiamento il corso della 
guerra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">περιγράφει τα όπλα, την ιατρική, τα τρόφιμα, τις ώρες
ελεύθερου χρόνου, και το ρόλο των γυναικών στον επαναστατικό 
πόλεμο. Εξετάζει επίσης τη μάχη που ήταν η μεγαλύτερη της 
νότιας εκστρατείας και που βοήθησε να αλλάξει την πορεία του 
πολέμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">describe las armas, la medicina, el alimento, 
horas del ocio, y el papel de mujeres en la guerra revolucionaria. 
También examina la batalla que eran la más grande de la 
campaña meridional y que ayudó al cambio el curso de la guerra.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206617</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107721</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/guilford-courthouse-national-military-park</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
